original: @83b # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @83b # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: krishna ya m'a ri sh'anti ho ma bi dhi n'a ma /
analyzed: krishna ya m'a ri sh'anti ho ma bi dhi n'a ma /
translated: Kṛṣṇayamāriśāntihomavidhināma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gshin rje gshed nag po'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed nag po'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba /
translated: The Ritual of the Black Yamāri Pacifying Burnt Offering

original: mgon po 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mgon po 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the protector Mañjuśrī.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can //
translated: The embodiment of body, speech, and mind,

original: char sprin gzhon nu'i mdog 'dra ba //
analyzed: char sprin gzhon nu'i mdog 'dra ba //
translated: Having the color of a youthful rain cloud,🔽Free from conceptualization, the lord who is spontaneously present,

original: rtog bral lhun gyis skyes pa'i bdag / gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal te //🔽sdig pa zhi dang bsod nams 'phel //
analyzed: rtog bral lhun gyis skyes pa'i bdag / gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal te // sdig pa zhi dang bsod nams 'phel //
translated: I pay homage to Yamāri.🔽For the sake of pacifying misdeeds, increasing merit,🔽Subjugating, destroying,

original: dbang du bya dang tshar bcad dang // dngos grub myur du thob bya'i phyir //
analyzed: dbang du bya dang tshar bcad dang // dngos grub myur du thob bya'i phyir //
translated: And quickly attaining spiritual powers,

original: bdag gis sbyin sreg bshad par bya //🔽bde gshegs chos kyi sku dag gi //
analyzed: bdag gis sbyin sreg bshad par bya // bde gshegs chos kyi sku dag gi //
translated: I will explain the burnt offering.🔽Those who have previously gone for refuge

original: bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis //
analyzed: bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis //
translated: To the Sugata's dharmakāya,

original: yid dga' ba yis phyogs su //🔽bkra shis bzang po'i gzhi dag la //
analyzed: yid dga' ba yis phyogs su // bkra shis bzang po'i gzhi dag la //
translated: With a joyful mind,🔽In a place with an auspicious, excellent foundation,

original: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i sa sbyangs nas //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i sa sbyangs nas //
translated: Having purified the site with the characteristics,

original: tshad dang ldan pa'i thab khung ni //
analyzed: tshad dang ldan pa'i thab khung ni //
translated: The hearth should have the proper measurements.

original: rgyar ni khru gang zabs su phyed //
analyzed: rgyar ni khru gang zabs su phyed //
translated: One cubit in width and half a cubit deep.

original: kha khyer sor bzhi dor nas kyang //
analyzed: kha khyer sor bzhi dor nas kyang //
translated: Having left a ledge of four fingerbreadths,

original: dpangs dang rgya ru sor bzhi brtsig //
analyzed: dpangs dang rgya ru sor bzhi brtsig //
translated: one should build a wall four fingerbreadths high and wide.

original: phyogs kyi thad kar sor gnyis las //
analyzed: phyogs kyi thad kar sor gnyis las //
translated: Two fingerbreadths in each direction,

original: dra ba zla tshe rdo rje'i gzugs //
analyzed: dra ba zla tshe rdo rje'i gzugs //
translated: one should make a latticework, half-moon, and vajra shape.

original: kha dog dkar po nyid byas te //
analyzed: kha dog dkar po nyid byas te //
translated: Having made it white in color,

original: tsandan dkar po'i 'o mas byugs //
analyzed: tsandan dkar po'i 'o mas byugs //
translated: one should anoint it with white sandalwood water.

original: @84a * // me tog dkar po dus gsum gtor //
analyzed: @84a * // me tog dkar po dus gsum gtor //
translated: One should scatter white flowers three times.

original: nang du 'dab brgyad dkar po bri //
analyzed: nang du 'dab brgyad dkar po bri //
translated: Inside, one should draw an eight-petaled white lotus,🔽arranging the wheel, vajra, jewel,

original: 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // padma ral gri phyag rgya dgod //
analyzed: 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // padma ral gri phyag rgya dgod //
translated: lotus, and sword mudras.

original: nang du rdo rje'i phreng ba ste //
analyzed: nang du rdo rje'i phreng ba ste //
translated: Inside, there is a vajra garland,

original: kha khyer me ris rnam par bskor //
analyzed: kha khyer me ris rnam par bskor //
translated: and the ledge is surrounded by a fire line.

original: thab kyi dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: thab kyi dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: This is done in relation to the hearth.

original: bud shing tshad ni khru gang la //
analyzed: bud shing tshad ni khru gang la //
translated: The size of the firewood is one cubit,🔽dry and old,

original: skam pa dang ni rnying pa dag / rul dang srog chags rnam spangs te //
analyzed: skam pa dang ni rnying pa dag / rul dang srog chags rnam spangs te //
translated: having abandoned rotten and living [wood].

original: n+ya gro dha dang p'a la sha / sha mi ta dang dri bzangs dang // byang chub shing dang tsandan dang // dri zhim bzang po'i shing de dag / thab kyi khor khor yug tu //
analyzed: n+ya gro dha dang p'a la sha / sha mi ta dang dri bzangs dang // byang chub shing dang tsandan dang // dri zhim bzang po'i shing de dag / thab kyi khor khor yug tu //
translated: and trees with fragrant flowers,🔽should be placed around the hearth.

original: ku sha sngon po bkram pa'i steng //
analyzed: ku sha sngon po bkram pa'i steng //
translated: On top of a spread of green kuśa grass,

original: thab khung dma' bar legs brtsigs la //
analyzed: thab khung dma' bar legs brtsigs la //
translated: in a low hearth well-constructed,

original: sbrang rtsi 'o ma dri chus byug / bud shing dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: sbrang rtsi 'o ma dri chus byug / bud shing dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: smeared with honey, milk, and fragrant water,🔽the firewood should be arranged.🔽The kindling should be from the top part

original: yam shing 'bras bu tsandan gyi //
analyzed: yam shing 'bras bu tsandan gyi //
translated: of a fruit-bearing sandalwood tree

original: shing ngam dri zhim shing dag la //🔽rtse mo'i cha las byung ba yi //
analyzed: shing ngam dri zhim shing dag la // rtse mo'i cha las byung ba yi //
translated: or a fragrant tree,

original: rlon dang 'dab mar bcas pa ste //
analyzed: rlon dang 'dab mar bcas pa ste //
translated: moist and with leaves.

original: sor bcu'i tshad du mngon par gsungs //
analyzed: sor bcu'i tshad du mngon par gsungs //
translated: It is said to be ten finger-widths in length.🔽Smeared with fragrant water and milk,🔽without cracks or breaks,

original: dri chu 'o mas sbags la bzhag / rtse gnyis gas dang chag pa dang // 'bus zos pa dang srog chags bcas //
analyzed: dri chu 'o mas sbags la bzhag / rtse gnyis gas dang chag pa dang // 'bus zos pa dang srog chags bcas //
translated: not eaten by insects, not hollow,🔽without bark, not dried out,🔽not crooked, not rotten, not thick,

original: shun pa med dang brla bskams dang // yo dang rul dang sbom pa dang // ring thung phra ba rnam par spangs //
analyzed: shun pa med dang brla bskams dang // yo dang rul dang sbom pa dang // ring thung phra ba rnam par spangs //
translated: not long, not short, and not thin.

original: gdags yig btags la bsreg par bya //
analyzed: gdags yig btags la bsreg par bya //
translated: The label should be burned.

original: bye brag dang ni sde tshan no //
analyzed: bye brag dang ni sde tshan no //
translated: [There are] the specific and the general.

original: na ma: sh'anti dku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: na ma: sh'anti dku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: namaste śāntikuru svāhā

original: au ma ka sye sarba tre ha nam /
analyzed: au ma ka sye sarba tre ha nam /
translated: oṃ kaśyapa sarvatra haṃ

original: sarba bighn'a na /🔽sarba dzva ra nam /
analyzed: sarba bighn'a na / sarba dzva ra nam /
translated: sarva vighaṃ🔽sarva jvālā haṃ

original: sarba by'a dhi nam /🔽sarba ro ga nam /
analyzed: sarba by'a dhi nam / sarba ro ga nam /
translated: sarva vyādhi haṃ🔽sarva rogā haṃ

original: sarba bisha nam /
analyzed: sarba bisha nam /
translated: sarva viṣā haṃ

original: sarba aa mam ga le nam /
analyzed: sarba aa mam ga le nam /
translated: sarva amāṅgalā haṃ

original: sarba du ra ni mi ta nam /
analyzed: sarba du ra ni mi ta nam /
translated: sarva duritāni mitā haṃ

original: sarba p'a pam karm'a ba ra nam /
analyzed: sarba p'a pam karm'a ba ra nam /
translated: sarva pāpaṃ karma varāṇa haṃ

original: sh'anti dku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sh'anti dku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: śāntikuru svāhā

original: til dang yungs kar rgyal po ni //
analyzed: til dang yungs kar rgyal po ni //
translated: sesame and mustard seed

original: sdig pa sbyang phyir bsreg par bya //
analyzed: sdig pa sbyang phyir bsreg par bya //
translated: are burned for the sake of purifying evil.

original: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ sarvapāpaṃ dahana vajrāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā

original: de nas mchod bstod gsol ba gdab //
analyzed: de nas mchod bstod gsol ba gdab //
translated: Then, make offerings, praises, and supplications,

original: dgang blugs phul la bsreg par bya //
analyzed: dgang blugs phul la bsreg par bya //
translated: present the filling and pouring ladle, and burn.

original: ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bsdu //
analyzed: ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bsdu //
translated: The awareness beings depart and the pledge beings are gathered.

original: aom a'a: hu'm mu;/🔽de nas me sbyangs sreg rdzas kyi //🔽lhag ma ji snyed pa rnams ni //
analyzed: aom a'a: hu'm mu;/ de nas me sbyangs sreg rdzas kyi // lhag ma ji snyed pa rnams ni //
translated: oṃ āḥ hūṃ muḥ🔽Then, whatever remains of the burnt offering

original: me yi lha la sngags kyis dbul //
analyzed: me yi lha la sngags kyis dbul //
translated: substances is offered to the fire god with the mantra.

original: mchod bstod dgang blugs bzod gsol bya //
analyzed: mchod bstod dgang blugs bzod gsol bya //
translated: Make offerings, praises, fill and empty, and request forbearance.

original: ye shes me lha gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: ye shes me lha gshegs su gsol //
translated: Request the departure of the wisdom fire god.

original: dam tshig 'bar ba'i rnam par bstim //🔽de nas bdag gi phyag rgya che //
analyzed: dam tshig 'bar ba'i rnam par bstim // de nas bdag gi phyag rgya che //
translated: Dissolve into the blazing form of the commitment being.🔽Then, with the method of releasing

original: dgrol dang thugs kar bsdu tshul @84b gyis //
analyzed: dgrol dang thugs kar bsdu tshul @84b gyis //
translated: and gathering at the heart the great seal of oneself,

original: dam tshig rgyal por gnas nas kyang //
analyzed: dam tshig rgyal por gnas nas kyang //
translated: dwelling in the commitment king,

original: thab la bskor zhing me tog dbul //
analyzed: thab la bskor zhing me tog dbul //
translated: circumambulate the hearth and offer flowers.

original: de nas glegs bam klog la sogs //
analyzed: de nas glegs bam klog la sogs //
translated: Then, read the scriptures and so forth,

original: ji ltar mthun pa'i spyod lam bya //
analyzed: ji ltar mthun pa'i spyod lam bya //
translated: and perform whatever conduct is suitable.

original: sgrub thabs mngon rtogs 'di dag ni //
analyzed: sgrub thabs mngon rtogs 'di dag ni //
translated: These realizations of the sādhana

original: dngos grub thob phyir bdag gis brtsams //
analyzed: dngos grub thob phyir bdag gis brtsams //
translated: I composed for the sake of attaining spiritual powers.

original: 'di yis bsod nams gang thob des //
analyzed: 'di yis bsod nams gang thob des //
translated: Whatever merit I have gained from this🔽may all attain the supreme common [powers].

original: kun gyi thun mong mchog thob shog / dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so /
analyzed: kun gyi thun mong mchog thob shog / dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so /
translated: The complete ritual of the peaceful fire offering of glorious Black Slayer of the Lord of Death is finished.

original: // / bla ma nag po'i zhabs nyid chen po la //
analyzed: // / bla ma nag po'i zhabs nyid chen po la //
translated: The great master Aṅghrimāṇi

original: gser gling rnal 'byor gu na dzny'a na yis //
analyzed: gser gling rnal 'byor gu na dzny'a na yis //
translated: the Yogin of Suvarṇadvīpa, Guṇajñāna,

original: bram ze karma tsandra btang nas kyang //
analyzed: bram ze karma tsandra btang nas kyang //
translated: sent the brahmin Karmacandra

original: rnal 'byor rnams kyi zhal ngor sbyin sreg 'di //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnams kyi zhal ngor sbyin sreg 'di //
translated: This fire offering for the yogis' faces

original: dpal mchog rdo rje gdan du rnam par brtsams //
analyzed: dpal mchog rdo rje gdan du rnam par brtsams //
translated: was composed by Śrī Paramadvaj on the vajra seat.

original: theg pa che la nyi ma'i 'od bzhin mdzes //
analyzed: theg pa che la nyi ma'i 'od bzhin mdzes //
translated: It is beautiful in the Great Vehicle like the sun's rays.

original: rnal 'byor pa bsod nams pa pra dzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du byas pa'o//
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa bsod nams pa pra dzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du byas pa'o//
translated: It was translated by the yogi Punyaprabha Prajñāśrījñānakīrti.
